channel.title: Python Conference Deadlines
channel.description: Countdowns to your favourite Python conferences with calls for participation and resources to submit awesome talks!

item.title: Kiwi PyCon XIII 2024 Conference Deadline
item.description:
Conference in Te Whanganui-a-Tara Wellington, New Zealand on August 23 - 25, 2024. CfP: 2024-05-23 23:59:00 AoE.
Find them here: @kiwipycon
